backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing players, fantasy teams, user profiles, and access-controlled operations with cost limits and point calculations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to source files, components, and requirement IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-written summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, profile setup, and switching between team-building and management views.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Unauthenticated landing screen with branding and login prompt.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button wired to Internet Identity with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for first-time users to enter and save their profile name.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header showing branding, user greeting, navigation buttons, and authentication control.
Layout wrapper with background image, content container, and footer linking to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/features/players/PlayerFilt: Provides search and role filter controls for filtering player lists.
frontend/src/features/players/PlayerList: Renders a list of players with role badges, stats, and add/select actions.
frontend/src/features/teams/CreateTeamSt: Form for creating a new fantasy team with validation and rules overview.
frontend/src/features/teams/ManageTeamsV: Displays the user's teams with loading state and option to create a new team.
frontend/src/features/teams/PlayerSelect: Handles filtering and adding players to a team while tracking balance and progress.
frontend/src/features/teams/RosterReview: Shows final team summary, validates the roster, and allows proceeding to finalize.
frontend/src/features/teams/TeamCard.tsx: Compact team overview card displaying completion status, points, and balance.
frontend/src/features/teams/TeamWizard.t: A multi-step wizard component for creating a fantasy team, selecting players, and reviewing the roster with visual step indicators.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Provides hooks to fetch and save the current user's profile using the authenticated actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserRole.ts: Fetches the current user's role from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context and provider, handling login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlayers.ts: Fetches the complete list of players from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useScopedTeams.ts: Retrieves all fantasy teams belonging to a specific user principal.
frontend/src/hooks/useTeamMutations.ts: Contains mutations for creating teams and adding players, with query invalidation for team-related data.
frontend/src/hooks/useTeamQueries.ts: Fetches a single fantasy team by ID using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTeamValidation.ts: Provides a mutation to validate a team via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode palette, and base typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/utils/points.ts: Utility functions for formatting points and currency and calculating total team points.
frontend/src/utils/roles.ts: Maps player roles to display labels and associated color classes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, supporting hash and query routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for container queries and animations.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing the project state, required images, implemented features, and pending feature requests for an IPL fantasy-style web app.
